text: Luka Zarandia (; born 17 February 1996) is a Georgian football player. He is a midfielder and currently plays for Zulte Waregem in the Belgian First Division A. ==Club career== After starting career in hometown club Locomotive Tbilisi, Zarandia moved to Poland in 2017 and joined Arka Gdynia. Luka Zarandia w Arce! (Arka sign Luka Zarandia); Arka's official website, 14 January 2017 He made debut for the club in April 2017 in a 5-1 defeat against Pogoń Szczecin. Pogon Szczecin - Arka Gdynia (Match Report) On July 2019, Zulte Waregem announced the signing of the Zarandia on a three-year agreement. Essevee stelt met Luka Zarandia derde aanwinst voor (Zulte signed Luka Zarandia); Zulte Waregem's official website, 2 July 2019 ==International== He made his debut for Georgia national football team on 16 October 2018 in a 2018–19 UEFA Nations League D game against Latvia. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Arka Gdynia * Polish Cup: 2016–17 * Polish SuperCup: 2017 ,2018 ==References== ==External links== *UEFA Profile * * *Arka Gdynia Player Profile Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Georgia (country) Category:Georgia (country) youth international footballers Category:Georgia (country) under-21 international footballers Category:Georgia (country) international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:K.R.C.
